image_prompts.title: Cosmic Wolf
image_prompts.description: A single majestic wolf with a sleek, galaxy-filled fur coat and glowing eyes, standing on all fours in a proud pose. The wolf is positioned on a rocky asteroid drifting in space under a vivid, colorful nebula sky. Distant stars and glowing celestial clouds fill the background. Anime-style lighting with high contrast and deep cosmic colors.
image_prompts.negative_prompt: extra limbs, extra heads, distorted anatomy, disjointed body parts, surreal shapes, blurry textures, missing features, duplicated elements, glitch effects, malformed faces

image_prompts.title: Dragon in Orbit
image_prompts.description: A colossal, anime-style dragon with strong limbs, detailed scales, and leathery wings, coiled tightly around a sleek, futuristic space station. The dragon breathes bright blue fire into the void. Below it, Earths curve glows with sunlight. The station features solar panels, metallic structures, and antenna arrays. Outer space lit by Earthlight and scattered stars, cinematic view.

image_prompts.title: Robotic Safari
image_prompts.description: A mechanical elephant, lion, and giraffe roam together, each with realistic animal anatomy and robotic plating, glowing joints, and visible servos.
